WorkItem.ClosedComment: ? There are no defaults ?  i defaults to all true for all models.
WorkItem.Description:
I loaded the BiS all items list from Elitist Jerks. once I did that, I started with what I usually do: check all items for sockets with problems (sometimes, when an item has one or 2 sockets, it appears like the socket is not filled. then you have, in the case of the Sindragosa neck, a blue square and right next to it a gem without a colored edge. I don't think this is due to rawr, but more due to an error in the XML file). however, when I do so, I cannot change this for the waist (Astrylian's Sutured Cinch) and the boots (Frostbitten Fur Boots), simply because there don't appear any leather and mail items in the drop-down list. this is either a bug in Rawr, or I have missed the option to allow leather and mail items.
Â 
I have attached the XML file, just in case you needed it.
WorkItem.Summary: [Retribution] Cannot select Leather or Mail Gear

Comments.Message: I think it might be that your missig an option. Go to Tools then Refine Types....Listed. If Leather and Mail have not been checked then these items wil not show on regular listed. Select the options then those items should show up on any and all lists.
Please adjust the defaults for this in Ret; these should be enabled by default, not disabled.

Read the directions



** Closed by Jothay 4/25/2010 3:20 PM
Thank you for noting the solution (Tools | Refine Types).  Please note that the same problem exists in 2.3.17, Leather and Mail items are not checked by default.

Sigh... Read the close note.

It is all enabled by default. None of the models explicitely enable or disable anything here.

if it's off, it's because you turned it off, or because you're using a character XML that had it already turned off.
